name: acled_v3_count
title: ACLED Conflict Events (Africa)
description: Number of conflict event counts per 0.1 decimal degree grid cell using ACLED (Armed Conflict Location & Event Data Project) v3. For subsets or other permutations of ACLED, please contact us at geo@aiddata.org.

extract_types_info.sum: count of conflict events per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: ratio of count of conflict events to pixel count within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Raleigh, Clionadh, Andrew Linke, HÃ¥vard Hegre and Joakim Karlsen. 2010. Introducing ACLED-Armed Conflict Location and Event Data. Journal of Peace Research 47(5) 651-660.
